Read and writeÂ¶

(coming soon)

# read amber format
In [1]: traj = pt.iterload('data/tz2.ortho.nc', 'data/tz2.ortho.parm7')

In [2]: traj
Out[2]: 
<pytraj.TrajectoryIterator, 10 frames, include:
<Topology: 5293 atoms, 1704 residues, 1692 mols, PBC with box type = ortho>>
           

# write to CHARMM dcd format
In [3]: traj.save('test.dcd', overwrite=True)

# write more than two trajs
In [4]: pt.write_traj('test2.dcd', [traj[:3], traj[5:]], top=traj.top)
